:: 2019 #9月份成人講道系列::

 『化憂傷為喜樂 Turinig Our Sadness into Gladness』

 
在人一生的旅途中，難免會遭遇患難與挫折；但聖經在【以賽亞書6:13】中，神應許信靠祂的人，祂要「賜華冠與錫安悲哀的人，代替灰塵；喜樂由代替悲哀；讚美衣代替憂傷之靈」這個系列我們要一起來探討，如何靠著主，化憂傷為喜樂！
In the journey of our lives, it’s inevitable that we will encounter tribulations
and frustrations. However, in the Book of Isaiah 61:3, God promises those who
believe int Him, “To grant to those who mourn in Zion-to give them a beautiful
headdress instead of ashes, the oil of gladness instead of mourning, the garment
of praise instead of a faint spirit. “ In this series, we will look into how we
can turn our sadness into gladness by our faith in the Lord.

在人一生的旅途中，難免會遭遇患難與挫折；但聖經在【以賽亞書6:13】中，神應許信靠祂的人，祂要「賜華冠與錫安悲哀的人，代替灰塵；喜樂由代替悲哀；讚美衣代替憂傷之靈」這個系列我們要一起來探討，如何靠著主，化憂傷為喜樂！
In the journey of our lives, it’s inevitable that we will encounter tribulations
and frustrations. However, in the Book of Isaiah 61:3, God promises those who
believe int Him, “To grant to those who mourn in Zion-to give them a beautiful
headdress instead of ashes, the oil of gladness instead of mourning, the garment
of praise instead of a faint spirit. “ In this series, we will look into how we
can turn our sadness into gladness by our faith in the Lord.
